title: exit
body: SKIP

title: HeidiA
body:
SKIP
<<displayOptions>>Welcome to [Caballa Island]! the stage of the Trickster game! Are you a new adventurer
[[ Yes |HeidiB]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: HeidiB
body:
<<displayOptions>>If you want to start your adventure in [Caballa Island], you need to first complete your [Registration Form].
[[ How can I? |HeidiC]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: HeidiC
body:
<<displayOptions>>Please take the [Registration Form] that I'm going to give you and give them to [Bunny Maid]. She will be processing your registration.
[[ Where is [Bunny Maid]? |HeidiD]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: HeidiD
body:
<<displayOptions>>If you head north and follow the path of the welcoming hula dancers, you'll see a [Reception Building] and [Bunny Maid] standing in front.
[[ Sounds good! |exit]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Bunny_MaidA
body:
SKIP
<<displayOptions>>Hello, I'm Bunny Maid. Are you here to complete your Registration?
[[ Yes I am! |Bunny_MaidB]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Bunny_MaidB
body:
<<displayOptions>>Did you come to complete your [Registration Form]? If you give me your [Registration Form] then I can start the process right away! Once the registration has been completed you will receive a pack of equipment called the [Rookie Set].
[[ Here you go! |Bunny_MaidC]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Bunny_MaidC
body:
<<ShowTip Bunny_MaidC>><<displayOptions>>Please head to [Coral Beach Field 1] and bring me bacsk 2 [Baby Carrots]. You can acquire the carrots by hunting [Torobbies].
[[ Okay |Bunny_MaidD]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Bunny_MaidD
body:
<<displayOptions>>Amazing! With that, you are now recognized as a geniune adventurer. Please feel free to explore and travel around [Caballa Island]!
[[ So what do I do next? |Bunny_MaidE]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Bunny_MaidE
body:
<<displayOptions>>All over [Caballa Island] are people that are in need of an adventurer's help. Help those people and get stronger. I'm sure you will quickly find out what the goal of [the Trickster Game] is.
[[ Oh I see! |Bunny_MaidF]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Bunny_MaidF
body:
<<displayOptions>>Here in [Blooming Cora, there is a girl named [Winnie] that is looking for some help. Why don't you lend her a hand?
[[ Sure, leave it to me! |exit]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: WinnieA
body:
SKIP
<<displayOptions>>Hm... I wonder if Deens is working Hard?
[[ Hello there! |WinnieB]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: WinnieB
body:
<<displayOptions>>Ah! Did [Bunny Maid] send you? Well, it's a good thing since I do need help. You will help me, right? If you do I will give you a [Young Egg pet.]
[[ What the heck is a Young Egg? … How do I help? |exit]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_DeenA
body:
SKIP
<<displayOptions>>Hey there! The safety of [Coral Beach] is my responsibility!
[[ Oh really? |Lifeguard_DeenB]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_DeenB
body:
<<displayOptions>>[Winnie] told you that she wanted me to call her? I told her that the beach would be dangerous and that she should stay in town. I guess she sent you instead of coming out herself.
[[ Okay |Lifeguard_DeenC]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_DeenC
body:
<<displayOptions>>Heh! She isn't my little sister by blood, but she definitely follows me around like she is. It looks like she's lonely. I've been pretty busy these days and haven't been able to play with her.
[[ You mean you really don't... |Lifeguard_DeenD]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_DeenD
body:
<<displayOptions>>Huh? What did you say?
[[ Ah, nothing... |Lifeguard_DeenE]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_DeenE
body:
<<displayOptions>>Heh! You're kind of thick, aren't you?
[[ Rude... |Lifeguard_DeenF]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_DeenF
body:
<<displayOptions>>Tottochis are a problem for Tinnie and her volleyball practice
[[ Who is Tinnie- |Lifeguard_DeenG]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_DeenG
body:
<<ShowTip Lifeguard_DeenG>><<displayOptions>>Muhaha! If you hunt [Tottochi] for me then I will tell you all about [Tinnie]! If you can hunt 5 in 10 minutes then I'm sure [Tinnie] will be happy too!
[[ ... Fine! I'll beat up the dumb little sea urchins. How'd I get suckered into doing this anyway? |Lifeguard_DeenH]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_DeenH
body:
<<displayOptions>>You already hunted them down? Not bad kid! Well as promised I'll tell you about [Tinnie]!
[[ Okay |Lifeguard_DeenI]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_DeenI
body:
<<displayOptions>>[Tinnie] takes care of the beach volleyball courts in [Coral Beach Field 2]. Be sure to tell [Tinnie] that I hunted all the [Tottochies] on my own!
[[ But I did... |exit]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: TinnieA
body:
SKIP
<<displayOptions>>Hiya! I'm [Caballa Island's] ace volleyballer, [Tinnie]!
[[ Hi Tinnie! |TinnieB]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: TinnieB
body:
<<displayOptions>>So you met with [Deen]? Me? I'm always doing well, of course hehe. Oh my! You hunted down the [Tottochies]? Thank you~
[[ It was a piece of cake. |TinnieC]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: TinnieC
body:
<<displayOptions>>That's good, but… these days it's not the [Tottochies] that are bothering me, but another set of pests. Do you think you can help me with something?
[[ Okay |TinnieD]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: TinnieD
body:
<<displayOptions>>Do you see the area around the [Beach Volleyball Court]? This is where I practice volleyball and take care of my official duties. The [Bad Fury] keep coming on to the court and disrupting my practice. If you could discipline 5 for 10 minutes then I'm sure that they'll stop disrupting my practice.
[[ Consider it done |TinnieE]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: TinnieE
body:
<<ShowTip TinnieE>><<displayOptions>>Like, if you use your [Skills], you will be able to hunt the monsters quicker. Come back once you've hunted them~
[[ I'll try using skills |TinnieF]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: TinnieF
body:
<<displayOptions>>Wow~ You totally took care of them! You're like, amazing! Now I can practice in peace. Here's a gift for your totally hard work.
[[ Thanks |TinnieG]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: TinnieG
body:
<<displayOptions>>Well, [Lifeguard Bean] has been, like, sending me gifts over and over again and it's starting to get super annoying. I've returned his gifts over and over again, but he still keeps sending them.
[[ That really is annoying… and kinda creepy, not gonna lie. |exit]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_BeanA
body:
SKIP
<<displayOptions>>Yoohoo~Hi! Welcome to the temple of my beauty, the lovely beach, the sanctuary of me!
[[ Uh.. Hi? |Lifeguard_BeanB]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_BeanB
body:
<<displayOptions>>Hehe~ Since you brought me a message from my lovely [Tinnie] I will tell you something good.
[[ (He's even worse than I imagined!) |Lifeguard_BeanC]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_BeanC
body:
<<displayOptions>>Look kid, I would love to tell you right away, however the world is a heartless place! I'm gonna take you under my wing and tell you some interesting things if you can bring me back 5 [Cool Ice]. You can get them from the [Blue Penguins] that are wandering around this area~
[[ Ug... Fine... |Lifeguard_BeanD]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_BeanD
body:
<<displayOptions>>Yoohoo Looks like you were able to bring me all the [Cool Ice] like I asked! My favorite beach has been heating up because of my awesomeness. So that's why I needed the ice, to help cool it down.
[[ Uh... We're in a desert? |Lifeguard_BeanE]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_BeanE
body:
<<ShowTip Lifeguard_BeanE>><<displayOptions>>You do know how to Equip items right? Speak to me after you've equipped the [Pocket Pouch], okay? If you don't I'm gonna have to haunt you every day!
[[ Equipping it now! |Lifeguard_BeanF]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_BeanF
body:
<<displayOptions>>You do know how to Equip items right? Speak to me after you've equipped the [Pocket Pouch], okay? If you don't I'm gonna have to haunt you every day!
[[ Equipping it now! |Lifeguard_BeanG]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_BeanG
body:
<<displayOptions>>Ya know, truthfully, everything you've done up until now was a test for your Adventurer Registration. Surprising isn't it? Since you passed all the tests you are now areal adventurer! Now go out there are show everyone what you've got!
[[ What do I do now? |Lifeguard_BeanH]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_BeanH
body:
<<displayOptions>>Well, first of all you should meet [Don Giuvanni]. He is the one that manages the game and is currently preparing to train beginner adventurers. So make sure you meet him~
[[ Okay |Lifeguard_BeanI]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_BeanI
body:
<<ShowTip Lifeguard_BeanI>><<displayOptions>>[Don Giuvanni] is the Vice President of the [Megalo Company] that created Trickster. Head east from here and you will see a cave. Go through the cave and you will get to [Gate of Desert Beach] and you should see him there
[[ OK |Lifeguard_BeanH]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Lifeguard_BeanH
body:
<<displayOptions>>Yoohoo~ If you want to get stronger, why don't you help out the people that you see on your way to meeting [Don Giuvanni]?
[[ Oh okay |exit]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Hunter_YuriA
body:
SKIP
<<displayOptions>>Hi hi! My name is Yuri and I'm here to manage the monsters of [Coral Beach Fields]. However, recently there have been some monsters with serious attitude problems. They act like they own the place, and its getting me stressed out!
[[ Tell me more! |exit]]
[[ Check Monster Quest Rankings |exit]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Explorer_ReinaA
body:
SKIP
<<displayOptions>>Hmph! It's way too hot for treasure hunting.
[[ Can I help you? |Explorer_ReinaB]]
[[ Stop complaining! |Explorer_ReinaB]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Explorer_ReinaB
body:
<<displayOptions>>Help? Really? Aren't you a helpful one! Do you think you can bring me 5 [Cool Spring Waters]? It should help cool me down a bit. You can get them from the [Clione] that are roaming around this area.
[[ Okay |Explorer_ReinaC]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Explorer_ReinaC
body:
<<displayOptions>>You didn't know? From what I heard, along with rewards there are lots of treasure buried all around... Of course the best treasure has to be the [Harkon].
[[ Harkon? |Explorer_ReinaD]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Explorer_ReinaD
body:
<<ShowTip Explorer_ReinaD>><<displayOptions>>Yup, [Harkon]. The [Harkon] is a legendary stone that shines brightly with the seven colors of the rainbow. It's a mysterious gem that supposedly has great powers. I'm sure it's worth a lot!
[[ Oooh, rainbows! |exit]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Don_GiuvanniA
body:
SKIP
<<displayOptions>>Congratulations on participating in this game. I am the Megalo Company's Vice President, [Don Giuvanni].
[[ Vice President? |Don_GiuvanniB]]
[[ Not Interested |Don_GiuvanniB]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Don_GiuvanniB
body:
<<displayOptions>>Ha Ha... Well, [Don Cavalier] was an irresponsible president who left that sort of dying wish without even considering the company's business. Since he isn't here I'm in charge now!
[[ So that means you're president? |Don_GiuvanniC]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Don_GiuvanniC
body:
<<displayOptions>>Even though I have yet to formally become the president, there isn't another well-qualified person other than me. Haha… therefore, the winner of the game will be chosen by me. But, you know, the one thing I hate the most is waiting.
[[ Next |Don_GiuvanniD]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Don_GiuvanniD
body:
<<displayOptions>>I don't have the patience to sit here and watch someone move like a turtle after claiming to become a [Trickster]. So if you quickly want to become a [Trickster], then get on this training regimen I have planned.
[[ OK sure |Don_GiuvanniE]]
[[ No thanks |Don_GiuvanniE]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Don_GiuvanniE
body:
<<displayOptions>>Drilling is necessary in the game. Get it? Go quickly! Now!
[[ Okay |Don_GiuvanniF]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Driller_MarkyA
body:
SKIP
<<displayOptions>>Drill~Drill~Drill~Sigh~Such a refreshing sound~
[[ Drilling eh? |Driller_MarkyB]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Driller_MarkyB
body:
<<displayOptions>>Look at me! Can you see the [Drill Gauge] show up as I'm drilling? This is the [Drill Gauge]. When you see the [Drill Gauge] then [click] with your mouse.
[[ I see |Driller_MarkyC]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Driller_MarkyC
body:
<<ShowTip Driller_MarkyC>><<displayOptions>>The test is simple. In this area, there are bottles of [Tanning Oil] buried in the ground. It's from all the people who come here and throw away stuff. Might as well save the Earth while drilling, right? Bring me back 2 bottles [Tanning Oil].
[[ OK |Driller_MarkyD]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Driller_MarkyD
body:
<<displayOptions>>[Drilling for Dummies] is a book for those that want to master drilling. Also, I'm sure the pet I gave will be a lot of help for you too, so take care of it~
[[ Okay |exit]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Don_GiuvanniF
body:
<<displayOptions>>...Looks like you did it quickly. Great! Then I'll give you a gift for the next stage!
[[ The next stage? |Don_GiuvanniG]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Don_GiuvanniG
body:
<<displayOptions>>My strict regiment for you is not over yet! Go to [Paradise] and meet my special agent to start the second stage!
[[ Second stage? |Don_GiuvanniH]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Don_GiuvanniH
body:
<<displayOptions>>Go to the Desert Town of Paradise and meet up with his agent, Robert. It's past Desert Beach Field 1
[[ Excuse me, Don Giuvanni, but isn't there a quicker way to town? |Don_GiuvanniI]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Don_GiuvanniI
body:
<<displayOptions>>Don't you know about [Trickster's] excellent [Teleport] system? Head east from here and you will see a Megalo worker in a green outfit named [Kochi]. Try asking her to send you to [Paradise]!
[[ Oh but, [Lifeguard Bean] sent me here... |Don_GiuvanniH]]
[[ OK |Don_GiuvanniH]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: Don_GiuvanniH
body:
<<ShowTip Don_GiuvanniH>><<displayOptions>>Hm... I already heard from [Bean], but since you have started on my training regimen I have nothing more to say to you. Hurry up and go to [Robert]!
[[ OK |exit]]
[[ Exit |exit]]

title: KochiA
body:
SKIP
<<displayOptions>>Hello~ Nice to meet you. My name is Kochi and I came here to Caballa with my sister Pachi to Teleport tourists. Are you ready to go to paradise?
[[ Teleport to Paradise (300 Galders) |exit]]
[[ Exit |exit]]
